title: The Best of zoom Martha
brief_description: Looks at the life of Martha Rudolph, a teenager suffering from epilepsy. Shows her positive outlook on life as well as her family’s reactions to her disability. Also mentions that there are degrees of epilepsy and provides a brief explanation of why epileptic fits occur.
